favourite.article: Thank You Lord, You are near and with us all our days. Amen.

What a great reminder!! Everything else will fail, except His promise :) When times get rough, He is always there for us. Praise Him no matter what we are going through in life, The Lord wants us to enjoy Him in both peaks & valleys!
The words were written by H.L.R. Deck. My old sheet music says "From F.C. Goudimel" and is also a different tune (C_DEF_E_DC_BC| E_FGA_G_FEDCD---| etc). Rich!

The Lord be praised. I have gone through deep distresses for some time now. And the truths expressed in the hymn catches what is in my heart. I was singing just parts of two stanzas... Then I searched the net and found your site. Thanks for your ministry.

I love this hymn too. A friend sang it at our wedding 43 years ago, and I have turned to it often. The tune used here is different from the one I know from the old IVCF "Hymns". But this also has a stanza (#2) that "Hymns" doesn't include. I'm grateful to have found this site. Can anyone tell me the background to this song?

I really enjoy verse 4 because it reminds us that we always need the Lord. It's easy to forget Him on the days that we "don't need" Him; when we are happy and our lives are going well. However, these are the days we need to most remember to draw near to the Lord!
The lyrics is a great encouragement for me... Thanks!

I really enjoyed this song. When times get rough, the Mercy and Grace of the Lord is there for us. The Lord will shine in our heart when we come to Him, believe in His promise. He is our Comforter. Amen!

This hymn encourages me to just pursue the Lord and hold on to His Word no matter what the situation is in our christian life and in our church life. All else will fail but His promise, His Word will remain. Praise the Lord!
everything in this world is temporary and are vanities, only the Lord is eternal and worthy! Does any of you saints, know the chords for this hymn?
Whatever circumstances we are in the Lord is always with us. Everything around us may change but His Word, His promises to us will never change.
Praise the Lord that He can be with us as our strength and working in us ALL the days- not just the good or bad, but also the ordinary days in between where nothing seems to happen.
I really enjoyed this song as I went through all the different kinds of days of my life. Praise the Lord for His grace!
